biography_text: KIND, Ron, a Representative from Wisconsin; born in La Crosse, La Crosse County, Wis., March 16, 1963; B.A., Harvard University, Cambridge, Mass., 1985; M.A., London School of Economics, London, England, 1986; J.D., University of Minnesota School of Law, Minneapolis, Minn., 1990; lawyer, private practice; state prosecutor, La Crosse County, Wis., district attorney’s office, 1992-1996; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Fifth and to the ten succeeding Congresses (January 3, 1997-present).
place_of_birth: La Crosse, La Crosse County, Wis.

post_secondary_degrees.institution: London School of Economics, London, England
University of Minnesota School of Law, Minneapolis, Minn.
